name: search-index
description: A network resilient, persistent full-text search library for the browser and Node.js

scripts.build: npm run empty-sandbox && rm -rf ./dist/* && webpack && cd dist && ln -s search-index-*.js search-index.js && cd ..
scripts.demo-rebuild: npm run demo-fetch && npm run demo-process && npm run demo-export && npm run demo-link-lib
scripts.empty-sandbox: rm -rf fii && rm -rf test/sandbox && mkdir test/sandbox
scripts.test: npm run empty-sandbox && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser && npm run lint
scripts.test-browser: npm run build && cat test/sandbox/browser-tests.js | tape-run
scripts.toc: doctoc docs/API.md --title '# API Documentation for search-index' && doctoc docs/FAQ.md --title '# FAQ'

author: Fergus McDowall
